title: Illaoi spawned tentacle bug...

embed.description: What a hacker looks like. Why was there no missile display? and WHY WAS IS TO FAST?

body:
this is from her ghost grab thingy.  The spawned tentacle slammed way to fast and did not display the missile to show where it was going to land.
i slowed down the video to show just how fast it slammed.  count how many steps i took before right when the tentacle became erect and before it slammed.  it happened less than half a second.  that seems a little too fast.
